snippet.title: Battle Chasers: Nightwar - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
Add us to your STEAM Wishlist! http://store.steampowered.com/app/451020/

Battle Chasers: Nightwar is an RPG inspired by the classic console greats, featuring deep dungeon diving, turn-based combat presented in a classic JRPG format, and a rich story driven by exploration of the world.

Battle Chasers: Nightwar is being developed by Airship Syndicate and published by Nordic Games.
